author: TravisEz13
body:
- [x] fix libpsl-native per issue https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/issues/29700
 - [x] make sure this issue is resolved: https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/issues/29700 . (see https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/6853)
- [ ] publish a new libpsl-native
 - [x] change this line to true https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/472b5f7bd1dbc97f685a781f44c1f5c561e3e637/PowerShell.Common.props#L142
title: Enable optimization of non-windows build
